title: Good Morning/Afternoon GD!
body:
http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/248/c/0/river_spirit_nami_by_kailistark-d7y15br.png

{{champion:267}} How are you today? How was your Halloween? Got any plans for the weekend?

Also if you'd share some amazing league art with me, I'd really appreciate it! I add everything I get in these threads to my folders at home :D
